attributes.action: speak out against gay people being punished for being gay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As more cases are brought to light about discrimination, torture and death being used against people for being homosexual, it is time to say that there is no reason or excuse acceptable anymore, be it religious, moralistic or otherwise. This government now needs to actively speak out against ANY country that undertake such actions, without any exceptions on any grounds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
